about_the_game:
GunDeck[100] Demo is a lightning-fast twin-stick shooter where you’ll build your arsenal from randomly-dealt cards. Weapons fire a rainbow of elements with unique effects. Fire through your entire arsenal, and reload all weapons at once. Dart and dodge to survive the fireworks unleashed against you, and retaliate with your own display!

This demo is a sample of the full game GunDeck[100], where you'll get to try your hand at infinity mode, and the first of sixteen ships that are available in the full game. Where classic mode is more balanced game with specifically 100 waves, as well as bosses, infinity mode goes on for as long as you can survive. In Infinity mode, one enemy is added per wave, resulting in an overwhelming number of enemies the more waves you survive. How far ca you survive?
